casebody.data:
BP EXPLORATION & PRODUCTION INC., et al., applicants,
v.
LAKE EUGENIE LAND & DEVELOPMENT, INC., et al. No. 13A1177. Supreme Court of the United States June 9, 2014.

Case below, 744 F.3d 370.

Application to recall and stay the mandate of the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit presented to Justice SCALIA and by him referred to the Court denied.
